About the creator CC View profile Chase Chappell @ chaseca • Joined Jul 2024 Chase Chappell, founder of Sirge.com, is a serial entrepreneur and expert in Facebook and TikTok ads, advising on over $200M in ad spend. He leads the Ads Mastery Mentorship program and is a partner at DOE Media, an agency recognized by Inc. 5000 as one the the fastest growing company in the US. FAQs Is there a time limit to complete the mentorship? Is This A true 1-on-1 Mentorship? "I Don't Have A Business Yet" Do I Get On-Going Support?
